name: predate
content:
predate verb [T]
(BE BEFORE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
to have existed or happened before another thing: These cave paintings predate any others which are known. Compare
backdate
postdate (HAPPEN AFTER)

predate verb [I or T]
(KILL)
to kill and eat another animal: Some species of bat predate small mammals. Possums will predate on baby birds and eggs. See also
predator
predation

to have existed or happened before another thing: These burial mounds predated the arrival of Europeans in North America.
